notes.note:
Firefox for Android v68.1 introduces on-by-default [Enhanced Tracking Protection][1]. Users will now benefit from protections against ad, social, and analytics trackers.


  [1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/blog/2019/09/03/todays-firefox-blocks-third-party-tracking-cookies-and-cryptomining-by-default/

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 68.1 Release
